cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
write_files: 
- content: |
    search @@{domain}@@
    nameserver @@{dns1}@@
  path: /etc/resolv.conf

runcmd:
- service network restart

users:
  - name: @@{centos.username}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    ssh_pwauth: True
    disable_root: false

chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:@@{root.secret}@@
    @@{centos.username}@@:@@{centos.secret}@@
  expire: False

runcmd:
 - [ hostnamectl, set-hostname, "@@{name}@@" ]
 - [ ifdown, eth0 ]
 - [ ifup, eth0 ]

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
write_files: 
- content: |
    search @@{domain}@@
    nameserver @@{dns1}@@
  path: /etc/resolv.conf

runcmd:
- service network restart

users:
  - name: @@{centos.username}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    ssh_pwauth: True
    disable_root: false

chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:@@{root.secret}@@
    @@{centos.username}@@:@@{centos.secret}@@
  expire: False

runcmd:
 - [ hostnamectl, set-hostname, "@@{name}@@" ]
 - [ ifdown, eth0 ]
 - [ ifup, eth0 ]
